member.name: M:GltfLoader.Interface.GetExternalFileSolver(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an External File Solver for a given gltf file path, so we can resolve references to associated files
member.param: ource file path to a gltf/glb model

member.name: M:GltfLoader.Interface.LoadBinaryBuffer(GltfLoader.Schema.Gltf,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a binary buffer referenced by a specific Schema.Buffer
member.param: The Schema.Gltf model containing the Schema.Buffer
The index of the buffer
Source file path used to load the model

member.name: M:GltfLoader.Interface.OpenImageFile(GltfLoader.Schema.Gltf,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Opens a stream to the image referenced by a specific Schema.Image
member.param: The Schema.Gltf model containing the Schema.Buffer
The index of the image
Source file path used to load the model
member.returns: An open stream to the image

member.name: M:GltfLoader.Interface.LoadBinaryBuffer(GltfLoader.Schema.Gltf,System.Int32,System.Func{System.String,System.Byte[]})
member.summary: Gets a binary buffer referenced by a specific Schema.Buffer
member.param: The Schema.Gltf model containing the Schema.Buffer
The index of the buffer
An user provided lambda function to resolve external assets
member.remarks:
Binary buffers can be stored in three different ways: - As stand alone files. - As a binary chunk within a glb file. - Encoded to Base64 within the JSON.
The external reference solver funcion is called when the buffer is stored in an external file, or when the buffer is in the glb binary chunk, in which case, the Argument of the function will be Null.
The Lambda function must return the byte array of the requested file or buffer.

member.name: M:GltfLoader.Interface.OpenImageFile(GltfLoader.Schema.Gltf,System.Int32,System.Func{System.String,System.Byte[]})
member.summary: Opens a stream to the image referenced by a specific Schema.Image
member.param: The Schema.Gltf model containing the Schema.Image
The index of the image
An user provided lambda function to resolve external assets
member.returns: An open stream to the image
member.remarks:
Images can be stored in three different ways: - As stand alone files. - As a part of binary buffer accessed via bufferView. - Encoded to Base64 within the JSON.
The external reference solver funcion is called when the image is stored in an external file, or when the image is in the glb binary chunk, in which case, the Argument of the function will be Null.
The Lambda function must return the byte array of the requested file or buffer.

member.param: Schema.Gltf model
GLB output file path
Source file path used to load the model
optional GLB-stored Buffer (BIN data file). If null, then the first buffer Uri must point to a BIN file.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Accessor.ByteOffset
member.summary: The offset relative to the start of the bufferView in bytes.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Accessor.ComponentType
member.summary: The datatype of components in the attribute.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Accessor.Normalized
member.summary: Specifies whether integer data values should be normalized.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Accessor.Count
member.summary: The number of attributes referenced by this accessor.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Accessor.Type
member.summary: Specifies if the attribute is a scalar, vector, or matrix.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Accessor.Max
member.summary: Maximum value of each component in this attribute.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Accessor.Min
member.summary: Minimum value of each component in this attribute.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Accessor.Sparse
member.summary: Sparse storage of attributes that deviate from their initialization value.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Accessor.Name
member.summary: The user-defined name of this object.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.AccessorSparse.Count
member.summary: Number of entries stored in the sparse array.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.AccessorSparse.Indices
member.summary: Index array of size `count` that points to those accessor attributes that deviate from their initialization value. Indices must strictly increase.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.AccessorSparse.Values
member.summary: Array of size `count` times number of components, storing the displaced accessor attributes pointed by `indices`. Substituted values must have the same `componentType` and number of components as the base accessor.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.AccessorSparseIndices.BufferView
member.summary: The index of the bufferView with sparse indices. Referenced bufferView can't have ARRAY_BUFFER or ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER target.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.AccessorSparseIndices.ByteOffset
member.summary: The offset relative to the start of the bufferView in bytes. Must be aligned.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.AccessorSparseValues.BufferView
member.summary: The index of the bufferView with sparse values. Referenced bufferView can't have ARRAY_BUFFER or ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER target.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.AccessorSparseValues.ByteOffset
member.summary: The offset relative to the start of the bufferView in bytes. Must be aligned.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Animation.Channels
member.summary: An array of channels, each of which targets an animation's sampler at a node's property. Different channels of the same animation can't have equal targets.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Animation.Samplers
member.summary: An array of samplers that combines input and output accessors with an interpolation algorithm to define a keyframe graph (but not its target).

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Animation.Name
member.summary: The user-defined name of this object.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.AnimationChannel.Sampler
member.summary: The index of a sampler in this animation used to compute the value for the target.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.AnimationChannel.Target
member.summary: The index of the node and TRS property to target.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.AnimationChannelTarget.Node
member.summary: The index of the node to target.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.AnimationChannelTarget.Path
member.summary: The name of the node's TRS property to modify, or the "weights" of the Morph Targets it instantiates. For the "translation" property, the values that are provided by the sampler are the translation along the x, y, and z axes. For the "rotation" property, the values are a quaternion in the order (x, y, z, w), where w is the scalar. For the "scale" property, the values are the scaling factors along the x, y, and z axes.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.AnimationSampler.Input
member.summary: The index of an accessor containing keyframe input values, e.g., time.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.AnimationSampler.Output
member.summary: The index of an accessor, containing keyframe output values.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Asset.Copyright
member.summary: A copyright message suitable for display to credit the content creator.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Asset.Generator
member.summary: Tool that generated this glTF model. Useful for debugging.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Asset.Version
member.summary: The glTF version that this asset targets.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Asset.MinVersion
member.summary: The minimum glTF version that this asset targets.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Buffer.ByteLength
member.summary: The length of the buffer in bytes.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Buffer.Name
member.summary: The user-defined name of this object.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.BufferView.ByteOffset
member.summary: The offset into the buffer in bytes.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.BufferView.ByteLength
member.summary: The total byte length of the buffer view.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.BufferView.Target
member.summary: The target that the GPU buffer should be bound to.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.BufferView.Name
member.summary: The user-defined name of this object.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Camera.Orthographic
member.summary: An orthographic camera containing properties to create an orthographic projection matrix.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Camera.Perspective
member.summary: A perspective camera containing properties to create a perspective projection matrix.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Camera.Type
member.summary: Specifies if the camera uses a perspective or orthographic projection.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Camera.Name
member.summary: The user-defined name of this object.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.CameraOrthographic.Xmag
member.summary: The floating-point horizontal magnification of the view. Must not be zero.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.CameraOrthographic.Ymag
member.summary: The floating-point vertical magnification of the view. Must not be zero.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.CameraOrthographic.Zfar
member.summary: The floating-point distance to the far clipping plane. `zfar` must be greater than `znear`.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.CameraOrthographic.Znear
member.summary: The floating-point distance to the near clipping plane.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.CameraPerspective.AspectRatio
member.summary: The floating-point aspect ratio of the field of view.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.CameraPerspective.Yfov
member.summary: The floating-point vertical field of view in radians.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.CameraPerspective.Zfar
member.summary: The floating-point distance to the far clipping plane.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.CameraPerspective.Znear
member.summary: The floating-point distance to the near clipping plane.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Gltf.ExtensionsUsed
member.summary: Names of glTF extensions used somewhere in this asset.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Gltf.ExtensionsRequired
member.summary: Names of glTF extensions required to properly load this asset.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Gltf.Scene
member.summary: The index of the default scene.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.GltfChildOfRootProperty.Name
member.summary: The user-defined name of this object.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Image.MimeType
member.summary: The image's MIME type. Required if `bufferView` is defined.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Image.BufferView
member.summary: The index of the bufferView that contains the image. Use this instead of the image's uri property.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Image.Name
member.summary: The user-defined name of this object.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Material.Name
member.summary: The user-defined name of this object.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Material.PbrMetallicRoughness
member.summary: A set of parameter values that are used to define the metallic-roughness material model from Physically-Based Rendering (PBR) methodology. When not specified, all the default values of `pbrMetallicRoughness` apply.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Material.EmissiveFactor
member.summary: The emissive color of the material.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Material.AlphaMode
member.summary: The alpha rendering mode of the material.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Material.AlphaCutoff
member.summary: The alpha cutoff value of the material.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Material.DoubleSided
member.summary: Specifies whether the material is double sided.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.MaterialNormalTextureInfo.TexCoord
member.summary: The set index of texture's TEXCOORD attribute used for texture coordinate mapping.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.MaterialNormalTextureInfo.Scale
member.summary: The scalar multiplier applied to each normal vector of the normal texture.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.MaterialOcclusionTextureInfo.TexCoord
member.summary: The set index of texture's TEXCOORD attribute used for texture coordinate mapping.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.MaterialOcclusionTextureInfo.Strength
member.summary: A scalar multiplier controlling the amount of occlusion applied.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Mesh.Primitives
member.summary: An array of primitives, each defining geometry to be rendered with a material.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Mesh.Weights
member.summary: Array of weights to be applied to the Morph Targets.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Mesh.Name
member.summary: The user-defined name of this object.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.MeshPrimitive.Attributes
member.summary: A dictionary object, where each key corresponds to mesh attribute semantic and each value is the index of the accessor containing attribute's data.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.MeshPrimitive.Indices
member.summary: The index of the accessor that contains the indices.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.MeshPrimitive.Material
member.summary: The index of the material to apply to this primitive when rendering.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.MeshPrimitive.Mode
member.summary: The type of primitives to render.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.MeshPrimitive.Targets
member.summary: An array of Morph Targets, each Morph Target is a dictionary mapping attributes (only `POSITION`, `NORMAL`, and `TANGENT` supported) to their deviations in the Morph Target.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Node.Camera
member.summary: The index of the camera referenced by this node.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Node.Children
member.summary: The indices of this node's children.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Node.Skin
member.summary: The index of the skin referenced by this node.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Node.Matrix
member.summary: A floating-point 4x4 transformation matrix stored in column-major order.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Node.Mesh
member.summary: The index of the mesh in this node.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Node.Rotation
member.summary: The node's unit quaternion rotation in the order (x, y, z, w), where w is the scalar.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Node.Scale
member.summary: The node's non-uniform scale, given as the scaling factors along the x, y, and z axes.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Node.Translation
member.summary: The node's translation along the x, y, and z axes.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Node.Weights
member.summary: The weights of the instantiated Morph Target. Number of elements must match number of Morph Targets of used mesh.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Node.Name
member.summary: The user-defined name of this object.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Sampler.Name
member.summary: The user-defined name of this object.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Scene.Nodes
member.summary: The indices of each root node.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Scene.Name
member.summary: The user-defined name of this object.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Skin.InverseBindMatrices
member.summary: The index of the accessor containing the floating-point 4x4 inverse-bind matrices. The default is that each matrix is a 4x4 identity matrix, which implies that inverse-bind matrices were pre-applied.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Skin.Skeleton
member.summary: The index of the node used as a skeleton root.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Skin.Joints
member.summary: Indices of skeleton nodes, used as joints in this skin.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Skin.Name
member.summary: The user-defined name of this object.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Texture.Sampler
member.summary: The index of the sampler used by this texture. When undefined, a sampler with repeat wrapping and auto filtering should be used.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Texture.Source
member.summary: The index of the image used by this texture. When undefined, it is expected that an extension or other mechanism will supply an alternate texture source, otherwise behavior is undefined.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.Texture.Name
member.summary: The user-defined name of this object.

member.name: P:GltfLoader.Schema.TextureInfo.TexCoord
member.summary: The set index of texture's TEXCOORD attribute used for texture coordinate mapping.
